lead_paragraph: Aldo Simoncini, the goalie of San Marino, recklessly hit England winger Theo Walcott, putting him in the hospital with a bruised lung. Yet he received no foul, no penalty or even a red card for dangerous play.
snippet: Aldo Simoncini, the goalie of San Marino, recklessly hit England winger Theo Walcott, putting him in the hospital with a bruised lung. Yet he received no foul, no penalty or even a red card for dangerous play.
